=========================

+-------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Component               | KPI               | Target              |

| Task Assigner           | Assignment Latency| < 100ms             |

| Order Verifier          | Error Detection   | < 500ms             |
+-------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Spot Finder             | Processing Time   | < 2s                |
+-------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+
| Arm Motion              | Success Rate      | â‰¥ 90%               |
